title: Feed for Thought: How to Successfully Wean Beef Calves

subtasks: Choose an environment with minimal changes for the calves
Install a creep gate to allow calves access to a designated area
Provide calves with a supplemental feed such as commercial creep feed or highly digestible fiber (e.g., soy hulls or pellets)
Offer high-quality alfalfa with at least 20% protein and 180 relative feed quality
Focus on relative feed quality rather than relative feed value when selecting alfalfa
Understand the importance of highly digestible forage due to less efficient brumen in calves
